title: IRCTC Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Group General Manager/ General Manager Posts
description: The Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Group General Manager/ General Manager Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Tech and MBA can apply for the IRCTC Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
